law.text:
An assisted household is a designated household if it includes:
an individual who has been a member of the household for at least 12 months before the notice of intent is given and who:
is at least 62 years old on the day that the notice of intent is given; or
qualifies as a person with disabilities under § 3(b)(3) of the United States Housing Act of 1937, 42 U.S.C. § 1437f; or
a minor.
